name: "Boyfriend" Material
description:
15ml custom blended 3-free nail polish using high quality suspension base to prevent glitter from falling to the bottom of the bottle, and solvent resistant glitter which does not bleed or melt in the polish base.

A clear suspension base filled with micro metallic silver, gold, and turquoise glitter.
Use 1 thin coat to achieve an even coverage. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

Swatch by Vanessa of @mrslochness on Instagram. 1 coat over a mint polish.

name: Spirit Fingers
description:
15ml custom blended 3-free nail polish using high quality suspension base to prevent glitter from falling to the bottom of the bottle, and solvent resistant glitter which does not bleed or melt in the polish base.

A white creme base filled with mix of metallic and iridescent hex, square, and bar glitter.
Use 2 thin coats to achieve an even, opaque coverage. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

Swatch by Vanessa of @mrslochness on Instagram.

name: Queen B
description:
15ml custom blended 3-free nail polish using high quality suspension base to prevent glitter from falling to the bottom of the bottle, and solvent resistant glitter which does not bleed or melt in the polish base.

A coral pink jelly base filled with micro iridescent hex, small metallic gold, light pink, and hot pink dot, large metallic hot pink dot, and giant holographic light pink dot* glitters.
Use 3 thin coats to achieve an even, yet sheer coverage. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

*Dot glitters are large and heavy and will eventually sink to the bottom of the bottle over time. Before application, turn the bottle over for a few minutes to allow the larger glitters to reintegrate back into the polish. Minimal fishing is required to get the larger dots to hold onto the brush.

name: Rebel With A Cause
description:

A clear jelly base filled with different sizes and shapes of matte white and matte black glitters*.
Use as many coats as desired. One coat was used in the swatch. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

*Some larger glitters are heavy and will eventually sink to the bottom of the bottle over time. Before application, turn the bottle over for a few minutes to allow the larger glitters to reintegrate back into the polish. Minimal fishing is required to get the larger glitters to hold onto the brush.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

name: Jar Of Hearts
description:
15ml custom blended 3-free nail polish using high quality suspension base to prevent glitter from falling to the bottom of the bottle, and solvent resistant glitter which does not bleed or melt in the polish base.

A black jelly base filled with different sizes of metallic red and silver hex glitter.
Use 2 thin coats to achieve an even, opaque coverage. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.

name: So Into You
description:
15ml custom blended 3-free nail polish using high quality suspension base to prevent glitter from falling to the bottom of the bottle, and solvent resistant glitter which does not bleed or melt in the polish base.

A clear suspension base filled with matte white, purple, lavender, and mint glitter.
Use 1 thin coat to achieve an even coverage. It is suggested to allow each coat to dry before applying the next coat and adding a top coat to seal in the polish.

Hand-blended in micro batches which results in slight variations between polishes from different batches. Big 3 free (free from formaldehyde, toluene, and DBP). Includes 2 stainless steel mixing balls to help agitate the polish and glitter in the bottle.


(swatch shown over a grey base)

name: Custom 15ml Bottle
description:
Create your very own, one of a kind, Tryst Lacquers creation! You will have hand-ons input on the colour, formula, and glitters to get the polish you have always dreamed about! We will tweak the polish until you are 100% satisfied with how it looks and performs.

Using only the high quality products* we use in all our other polishes, we will be in contact with you during every step of the polish-making process, so you get to be completely involved in the creation of your Tryst Lacquer; you will even get to create the name of your very own polish!


*If products such a pigments, glitters, etc. need to be special ordered for your polish, processing time will take longer than usual.

name: 2mm Silver Studs Round
description: 50 count bag of round silver studs in 2mm size.
